Class Zombie

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.Actor
SuperSmoothMover
SuperActor
Pedestrian
Zombie
public class Zombie extends Pedestrian
Zombies are Pedestrians that attempt to chase and infect any Humans roaming around. If no Humans are found, it moves normally to get to the other side.

      public void knockDown()
